attention1.ptxt: During service procedures, be very careful when handling a sensor.

item.ptxt: Never strike or jar a sensor.
A sensor bolt must be carefully torqued to assure proper operation. Under loose connection, it could cause improper operation of the air bag system.

s1.ptxt: Disable air bag system. Refer to Disabling Air Bag System .
Remove center pillar lower trim and side sill scuff.
Disconnect side-sensor connector sliding connector outer (1) as shown.
Remove side-sensor bolts (1), and side-sensor (2) from under body (3).

attention2.ptxt: Proper operation of side-sensor requires that sensor is rigidly attached to specified position.

s1.ptxt: Check that none of following faulty conditions exists.

item.ptxt: Bend, deformity or rust of under body.
Foreign matter on mating surface of sensor.

s1.ptxt: Install side-sensor (1) on under body (2) and tighten side-sensor bolt (3) to specified torque.
Connect side-sensor connector pushing connector inner (1) as shown.
Enable air bag system. Refer to Enabling Air Bag System .
